subject: Baseball
Gambling
lead_paragraph: When Commissioner Rob Manfred denied a reinstatement request by Rose, baseball’s career-hits leader who was banned for life for gambling, his dreams of being inducted into the Hall of Fame were dealt a crippling blow.
snippet: When Commissioner Rob Manfred denied a reinstatement request by Rose, baseball’s career-hits leader who was banned for life for gambling, his dreams of being inducted into the Hall of Fame were dealt a crippling blow.
